TopicTitle: Planes without engines but full of freedom and democracy

Articles.Content:
About year i go started play around with strange bug wich allowed you to fly planes only using wings. I wanted to do videos about it but because i had some serius healt issues i didin't have the time. Now i decided that i could finaly make a video about it and here it is! Now i hope you guys could help me start my channel so that is why i posted the video here. Any ways enjoy the video!

I made another video, but because i alredy have 2 posts about my videos and i don't wan't to flood the forum with post's about my videos so i just put it here. The video is about a wormhole in the ksc....

And Once agein a new video. Because this post get suprisingly many views im just gonna keep linking these video to this post so i won't flood the forum with my videos.

The new one is about using kerbals as rcs.

That's called the Infiniglider Bug, and it's been known for some time. Still, the planes are really nice!
Funny video. Made me chuckle to watch that thing fly around so fast.
